item.title: Ohai cole
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

You still found out afterwards. And even then, as I’ve said before, you should have been able to tell by the way it was written that it was someone messing with you. If it were honestly someone calling you gay, it would have been more of a “You’re gay.” or “fucking faggot.”
And who are you to try and “punish” someone? If you did something like that to me, I wouldn’t have made a thread like this.
Either learn to control yourself, or don’t be my friend. Either way, our relationship friendwise is still damaged.

Read full topic

item.title: Ohai cole
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:17, topic:381588”]You DID know when posting the thread, or the title wouldn’t be “ohai cole”, and even if it wasn’t purposefully directed to humiliate me, it can still do so.
People are going to be saying I’m an attention whore for saying I’m quitting, and then come back cough. But still, if someone personal messages you, it’s because they want it personal.[/quote]Well that should teach you to call me gay without me knowing who you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Ohai cole
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:14, topic:381588”]With the vernacular I used, you could have near obviously told it was someone “joking” or trolling. And even after I explained, you said “screenied” and you posted the thread, in full knowing it was me. You’ve called me gay before, and I didn’t go and make a thread trying to humiliate you.[/quote]It’s different when I know who is calling me gay, When I know its someone I am use to, not some random person…This thread isn’t to humiliate you I mean whats so wrong with it? I wasn’t the one that said all of it, I just made sure everyone knew about it.

item.title: Ohai cole
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

BUT I WUS TROLLEN

I wasn’t being goofy, I tried to keep the second account in private from others (still wouldn’t have used it when school starts, whenever that may be), and he decided to tell everyone that I had another account. Now not only are people going to be thinking I am a liar, but a fool. I personal messaged him because I wanted it to be a private matter, not a public one. If you ever pmed me something you didn’t want others to know, and I posted a thread saying “LOOK AT THIS” and showed it, you would be pretty upset too.
And the reason it bugs me more than if some random user did it is because I tried to keep a secret with a friend, whom I entrusted.

Read full topic

item.title: Ohai cole
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:9, topic:381588”]I left because I needed to focus on school. We’ve been having snowstorms, so I figured I would have a temporary account to use until the storm passes.
“Bulldog” is my friend irl, and his brother is Gokia007. I was at their house last night, and he wanted me to find him a new home because he kept getting his stuff broken.
Still, the fact that you’re trying to publicly humiliate someone who assumed he was your friend, that’s pretty low.[/quote]I don’t see where you are coming from at all. You were being goofy, therefore Chris posted your goofiness.

I see no problem? Now please don’t pull a ranger squad and say you were trolling when you obviously weren’t.

Read full topic

“Bulldog” is my friend irl, and his brother is Gokia007. I was at their house last night, and he wanted me to find him a new home because he kept getting his stuff broken.
Still, the fact that you’re trying to publicly humiliate someone who assumed he was your friend, that’s pretty low.
